Email 1.subject: Re: Inventory that can ship prior to August 27

body.text:
I believe that to be the case currently, BUT the last General Tariff change did state to see the NEW Appendix II which we have not seen yet. If it does not change, we are still exempt, but ?
________________________________

Email 2.subject: RE: Inventory that can ship prior to August 27

body.text:
Dear Richard , I came to know from other USA buyer that there is no any additional tariff for our product which we export under HS CODE - 34024200 /34024290. Current Tariff is 5% only, Same as 2024. C
External

Email 4.subject: Re: Inventory that can ship prior to August 27

body.text:
Dear Richard,



Good Evening!



As per our earlier email, we would appreciate it if you could let us know how you would like us to proceed further.



Additionally, we would like to inform you that we also have inventory available with NP 50 flakes.



Looking forward to your response.

Email 6.subject: RE: Inventory that can ship prior to August 27

body.text:
Dear Richard,



Greetings of the day !



We understand your concern regarding the 50% tariff and the impact on future purchases.



We will check our records for the products purchased by you in the past two years and review our current inventory and production schedule. We will get back to you shortly with the list of any products that can be shipped and on the water before August 27.



Rest assured, we will prioritize this request and coordinate accordingly.

Email 7.subject: Inventory that can ship prior to August 27

body.text:
Good morning Ramesh and Komal,



Please share what if any of the products we have purchased from you in the past 2 years that can be shipped so they are on the water as of August 27,  with the tariffs of 50% it is going to slow our purchases until this is reduced. We cannot sell goods at this cost.



Thanks

Richard



Richard Barnhardt

FCI Technology

rbarnhardt@fcitechnology.net<mailto:rbarnhardt@fcitechnology.net>

704-629-4630 Ext 1206
